website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei P20 cuts some luxuries, but delivers similarly spectacular low-light photos of the Pro model.
pros: The Huawei P20 takes terrific low-light photos from the dual rear camera, comes in some astounding colors and is small enough to use with one hand
Like the P20 Pro, it lets you hide the default screen notch many Android fans hate
cons: Why is the P20 only splash-proof, but not rated water-resistant like the P20 Pro?
You won't be able to buy it in the US

customer_reviews.title: Not working with US AT&T 4G LTE
customer_reviews.text: I think I did a careful review and look through all Q&A part. It did mention that it works with AT&T wireless with 4G LTE. But after spending 4 hours with AT&T technician, we eventually gave up on it. It only works on 3G data. No 4G data service from AT&T at all. The production description is misleading. Return on second day and totally waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone! Everything works as expected. Joined AT&T network. Excellent cameras!
customer_reviews.author: Naijing W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, great resolution, seems like very strong fhone, amazing camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refund requested. I bought this product only two months ago.
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working suddenly, screen is damaged due to an electrical failure, it is completely black. This is unacceptable since I bought this product only two months ago, very disapointing. I request the refund for the whole cost.
customer_reviews.author: Patricf

customer_reviews.title: In love with my P20
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I need to be wordy, I am absolutely in love with my phone. This is my second Huawei device, I used to be a Samsung loyalist until I realized i we paying for things that don't affect my fault experience or the better way to say it is; I wasn't getting my money's worth. Wth this phone I get great battery life, some camera, customizing, and no bloatware.... What cold be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like this phone, the camera is not good. Trust me, I was using iPhone, this camera sucks.After I use it for one week . I wanted to return it , but they don't attach free shipment, but I thought it attached. So the usps do not return it, and It stayed in ups for one month. When we get back the phone,then I can not return it anymore. Very bad experience,then I have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Caicomics

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience with huawei device
customer_reviews.text: I ordered huwei p20 for the first time but the screen got malfuction in less than a month.and i buy again for the second time with the same model..the speaker got malfuction.now it doesnt wanna turn on..whats wrong with your device..you do not have insurance yet your device was not good
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Dulnuan

customer_reviews.title: On time and new
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the phone on time, it was brand new and came in a sealed package!!!! The phone works great. The seller was very nice (Mobiles International LLC)
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Ghietto

customer_reviews.title: A amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: A amazing phone i love it!!! Completely thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and good phone
customer_reviews.text: It was good. Delivery was a bit expensive but it was on time and good without any damage
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Get the Pro
customer_reviews.text: While this phone is nice in many ways, I beleive the Pro version is the real deal. This one can have some app slowdowns and I had facebook and facebook messenger crashing and locking up time to time. The battery life is surprisingly good, the pictures are very very good. It beats - hands down- my iphone X' shots, yes, believe it! On the other hand, there are some issues regarding the software. It will not take just any other launcher if you happened to not like EMUI interface, Id's say stay away from Huawei if you prefer Google stock-like launchers. Overall, it's a solid mid-range phone, but after trying out the 20Pro, this phone feels slow and subpar.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglander

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing photos and great storage L. The GPS does not work and is a common issue with these phones but no US warrenty I wonder why.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F

customer_reviews.title: Charger is not for USA. So converter is provided.
customer_reviews.text: Phone works superb. I like it.few things to note it comes with super charger that is made for Asia. So a cheap convertor is given. See pic. A letter from fsg trading stating that it won't working with sprint and verizon providers in USA. This is confusing because the product description in amazon doesnt mentions. The super charger is not for USA plug. These things must be mentioned in product description. It does comes with transparent phone cover. Overall its a good purchase with some surprises but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Great overall with minor design issue
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great overall. Camera's nice. Screen is slightly smaller than what I'm used to but not a big issue. My main issue is that the headphone is connected through micro usb instead of a headphone jack like a normal phone. I didn't think too much about it at first, until I'm actually using the phone and realize I can't charge the phone and listen to music at the same time. Again, great phone overall, but this is a stupid design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works on at&t for me. With 4g lte.
customer_reviews.text: This phone works great for me on at&t. With 4g lte . I have read that some users say that it does not. Well for me it does. So far when I have traveled back and forth to work I pick up three different 4g lite band frequency. I love this phone and everything works great as a everyday phone. I got this phone super cheap and it was better than getting a midrange phone in the Same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.
